entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low zero. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
